ca.c301.t03_model

Class IngredientDatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • ca.c301.t03_model.IngredientDatabaseHandler

  • public class IngredientDatabaseHandler
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Handles the Ingredients Database, which is also called Virtual Pantry

      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase db,
             int oldVersion,
             int newVersion)
        To upgrade, must drop the old ingredients table and then create a new one
        Parameters:
        db - Is the database to drop and create the table
        oldVersion - The version number of the old database
        newVersion - The version number of the new database
